attributes.action: Make all key workers exempt from the tax increase following the furlough scheme
attributes.additional_details: I think it’s unacceptable that key workers have to help contribute to the debt caused by the furlough scheme. Whilst the majority of population have enjoyed months of free time and free money, the crucial key workers have and still are putting their lives on the line and have had nothing but a pitiful clap to show for it. So I’m asking out of an act of decency to make all key worker staff exempt from the tax increase as if it weren’t for them the country would be in an even bigger crisis.
attributes.background: I want all key workers to be exempt from the addition tax increase that’s is to follow post ending the furlough scheme.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312359
